articles.author: Hakai Magazine
articles.title: Iron Fertilization Isn’t Going to Save Us - Hakai Magazine
articles.description: The controversial geoengineering technique can defer, at best, a few years’ worth of emissions. And that’s ignoring the potential side effects.
articles.content:
Article body copy
Last year, global carbon emissions from burning fossil fuels reached an all-time high. As the world heats up, many influential bodiessuch as the United Nations Intergovernmental Pa… [+6683 chars]
